title: Doom Patrol v3
description:
By request from the forums, this torrent includes DC comics&#039; Doom Patrol v3.
John Byrne&#039;s Doom Patrol
 
In August 2004, DC launched a new Doom Patrol series after the new team debuted in JLA. John Byrne wrote and illustrated this series, with inks by Doug Hazlewood. Touted as "Together again for the first time!", Byrne rebooted the series, eliminating the continuity that dated back to the Silver Age.

This also retroactively eliminated Beast Boy&#039;s origins and numerous important Doom Patrol appearances, including the reunions of Beast Boy (then called Changeling) and Robotman in the 1980s New Teen Titans and the team&#039;s important role in JLA: Year One. It also angered some of Morrison&#039;s fans, but DC editors argued that the team&#039;s classic line-up should be supported, especially since attempts to continue the Morrison/Vertigo continuity had proven unsuccessful. However, DC cancelled Byrne&#039;s series with issue #18.

This reboot was both controversial and short-lived. The events in DC&#039;s Infinite Crisis crossover saw the restoration of the Doom Patrol&#039;s full continuity, with the history of all previous incarnations, excluding Byrne&#039;s reboot.

Thanks to the scanners and the original sources

Please seed. Please enjoy.
